message:
Hi ,  i use Netty in my project and it's so good for me now , i'm hearing about http://akka.io and really do't know if i must move or integrate , 
any one know about AKKA (java) could help me , thanks
story: Mohamed A. Alqrwash shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Akka
caption: akka.io

data.message: I'm working on AKKA the Scala version, let me know if I can help.

ok , i would like to know if i cloud use AKKA with my exist Netty 
project , it  TCP  servers (Media server that support UDP , RTMP , etc ) , could this add performance to my project (i need this to be in JAVA not in Scala)
thanks
i use my container based on Netty

Look, Akka has many components that address different problems in any system. The good news is, you can only pick the parts that suites your solution. So if we take the Actors for example which is the core component in Akka, I think yes it can increase the parallelism in your system because actor model is the best in dividing computation on actors that share nothing between each other which make them safe from deadlocks. The question that you need to think about is do you have big jobs that can be broken down to small parallel jobs or not?
thank you for replying , i just see AKKA yesterday , i hope to learn more about it

Dear Mahmoud Atef 
i thank you , i would like to get help in this code to integrate AKKA

https://github.com/micromax/Qomiga

and i would like to thank you for your help 

not about code i just push this repo , i know it need a lot of reconfiguration to work in any machine , only think i need to know how to apply AKKA actors in it
